featureType.name: stations
featureType.title: stations
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

latLonBoundingBox.crs: GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]]

virtualTable.name: stations
virtualTable.sql: SELECT ss.rloi_id as id, CASE WHEN ss.station_type = 'G' THEN 'groundwater' WHEN ss.station_type = 'C' AND r.river_name IS NULL OR r.river_name = 'Sea Levels' THEN 'sea' ELSE 'river' END AS type, ss.centroid, (lower(ss.region) = 'wales' OR ss.rloi_id IN (4162, 4170, 4173, 4174, 4176)) AS isWales, ss.status, concat(CASE WHEN ss.station_type = 'G' THEN 'Groundwater' WHEN ss.station_type = 'C' AND r.river_name IS NULL OR r.river_name = 'Sea Levels' THEN 'Sea' ELSE 'River' END, ' level at ', ss.external_name) AS name, CASE WHEN ss.status != 'Active' THEN 'error' WHEN risk.at_risk = true THEN 'high' ELSE 'normal' END AS state, CASE WHEN r.river_name IS NOT NULL THEN r.river_name ELSE ss.wiski_river_name END AS river, CASE WHEN risk.processed_value = 'NaN' THEN null ELSE risk.processed_value END AS value, risk.value_timestamp as date, risk.trend, r.up, r.down, FROM u_flood.telemetry_context_mview ss left join ( -- Get at_risk, but ensure get highest risk and direction in case M station. SELECT distinct rloi_id, at_risk, direction, processed_value, value_timestamp, percentile_5, percentile_95, trend, forecast, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY rloi_id order by at_risk desc, direction desc, processed_value, value_timestamp, percentile_5, percentile_95, forecast) as risk_rank FROM u_flood.stations_overview_mview order by rloi_id ) as risk on risk.rloi_id = ss.rloi_id and risk.risk_rank = 1 left join u_flood.ffoi_max ffoi on ss.telemetry_id = ffoi.telemetry_id left join u_flood.rivers_mview r on ss.rloi_id = r.rloi_id and risk.direction = r.qualifier WHERE (lower(ss.region) != 'wales' OR ss.catchment IN ('Dee', 'Severn Uplands', 'Wye'))
